content: 3 3 4 4 sts in remaining underarm sts you should now be at the start of the circular needle and next to the sts that were picked up for the armhole at the start the middle of the underarm is the start and end of your round you should have 40 42 44 48 52 sts in total 20 21 22 24 26 sts = front needle 20 21 22 24 26 sts = back needle using whatever method you wish - magic loop 2 circulars or double ended needles knit 5 rounds 4 decrease round - needle 1 k1 ssk knit the rest of the sts needle 2 knit till last 3sts k2tog k1 knit 5 rounds then do another decrease round as above continue to work as established decreasing 4 5 4 6 6 times in total until you have 32 32 36 36 40 sts knit straight until sleeve measures 12 5 14 15 5 16 5 18 cm / 5 5 ½ 6 6 ½ 7 ins from the armhole or 1 5 cm / ½ less than desired length ribbing every row k2 p2 until end of the round continue in 2x2 rib for 6 row cast off loosely in pattern band use 3 75mm needles with rs facing & beginning at bottom of right front edge pick up & knit 2sts for every 3 row along right front edge of cardigan pick up and knit 1 st in each co st around neckline & top of sleeves pick up and knit 2 sts for every 3 row along left front edge work 6 6 6 8 8 row in rib pattern cast off loosely in pattern make buttonholes k2tog or p2tog depending on where you are placing the buttonholes in the rib pattern yo method evenly spaced on right hand side for a girl and left side for a boy finishing weave in any ends sew on buttons 5
